Description: For sale is a very clean ESP Horizon FR-II 6 string Floyd Rose right handed guitar in Reindeer Blue. Made in Japan in 2011. Ebony fretboard, neck through body construction. I bought this guitar a couple years ago from the original owner in literally unplayed condition. I've played it around the house only since then. It looks, plays & sounds incredible. The guitar is loaded with EMG Het Set pickups. I went looking for any cosmetic blemishes to be as detailed as possible & here they are, all as seen in the photos. There's a small clear coat nick on the back rib just above the strap button, a small amount of plating has flaked off one of the knobs, and there's a very small clear coat finish crack up at the nut. Of course there are some pick marks from playing. As you can see the amount of fret wear is very minor. Overall the guitar is in very good condition for the age. I've used it in a number of YT reviews I've done, here's one for you to see/ hear. https://youtu.be/A-ATYsY8IMc?t=618 Also, I will let the buyer choose from the three hard shell cases in the last pic which one they want. Will ship UPS ground signature required to the lower 48, and I'll cover the cost. If you want it shipped faster or somewhere else please contact me before buying. I want to give all the info possible so we both have a good experience, so let me know if you have any questions. Cross posted on Reverb. Thanks!
Title: ESP Horizon FR-II NTB Floyd Rose Het Set Reindeer Blue guitar
